sources.title: The Checkered Flag (1963) WILLIAM GREFÉ
sources.description:
Fasten your seatbelts for the debut by Sunshine State filmmaker Wild Bill Grefé!
Starring: Evelyn King, Charles G. Martin, Joe Morrison
Written & Directed by: William Grefé

The boozy wife of a millionaire race car driver conspires with a hod rod rookie to murder her husband and get her claws on his fortune. Racing scenes were filmed at Florida's Sebring International Raceway.

metadata.Plot: (1963) Peggy Vendig, Joe Morrison, Charles Martin, Evelyn King. A wild movie. The wife of an aging, millionaire race car driver talks a young rookie into helping her dispose of her hubby. Their plan brings horrifying results. The ...
metadata.Actors: Joe Morrison, Evelyn King, Charles G. Martin
